citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on
Thursday, December 5, 2024. The inspector arrived at the facility and was told by a family member the licensee was not
home and was not expected for several hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00 pm on 
Thursday, December 5, 2024. The inspector arrived at the facility and was told by a family member the licensee was not 
home and was not expected for several hours. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection 
is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
